verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: time to stop changing clocks] californians consider permanent daylight saving voters who hate resetting their clocks twice a year took the first step tuesday to making daylight saving time year - round in california with nearly 4 5 million ballots counted proposition 7 led by more than 62 percent daylight
